aboutWahiddarbar: Wahid Darbar, the first online restaurant, has made it possible for everyone to access a variety of local and foreign dishes. Wahid Darbar is the first online food ordering brand in Afghanistan, which started in 1399 with the aim of establishing a culture of online food ordering. Wahid Darbar wants to create a new transformation in the field of local, foreign food and fast food. Would you like to eat local Afghan and foreign food? Have you considered ordering Qaboli, Biryani or ordering Kichiri Gosht Land? Do you want to enjoy our free delivery services for a lunch at you work place? Or maybe you have guests for night at home and enjoy our denier dishes? Wahid Darbar is always with you. Open Wahid Darbar website or order true our mobile app by downloading its application with ease. Experience comfort and various tests by ordering food online in most parts of Herat only via delivery.
closedText: Wahid Darbar is closed for  this time
